top.title: Venezuelan opposition leader makes first public appearance after months in hiding
top.summary: Nobel Peace Prize winner María Corina Machado, who has been in hiding since January, arrives in Oslo after a secretive journey.

top.title: US seizes oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela, Trump says
top.summary: Venezuela condemns the operation as an act of "international piracy", vowing never to be an "oil colony".

top.title: Iceland becomes fifth country to boycott Eurovision
top.summary: Iceland joins Spain, Ireland, Slovenia and the Netherlands in saying it will boycott the 2026 contest.

top.title: Oracle shares slide as earnings fail to ease AI bubble fears
top.summary: The cloud computing giant's revenue miss renews questions about its financial health.

top.title: Porn company starts new age checks after £1m Ofcom fine
top.summary: The media regulator Ofcom said AVS Group Ltd had started age checks on some of its porn websites.

top.title: McDonald's Netherlands pulls AI Christmas ad after backlash
top.summary: McDonald's said the moment served as "an important learning" as it explored "the effective use of AI".
